25 void conf_callback(calib::ICPConfig &config, uint32_t level)
26 {
27  enable = config.enable;
28  autom = config.autom;
29  reciproc = false; //config.reciproc;
30  max_dist = config.max_dist / 1000;
31  max_it = config.max_it;
32  eps = pow(10, -config.epsilon);
33  subsize = config.subsize / 1000;
34 }
35 
36 pcPtr subsample(const pcPtr& input, float size)
37 {
38  if (input->points.size() > 0)
39  {
40  filter_voxel.setInputCloud(input);
41  filter_voxel.setLeafSize(size, size, size);
42  pc_t* cloud = new pc_t;
43  filter_voxel.filter(*cloud);
44  pcPtr output(cloud);
45  if (output->points.size() > 0)
46  {
47  return output;
48  }
49  else
50  {
51  return input;
52  }
53  }
54  else
55  {
56  return input;
57  }
58 }
59 
63 void pc_callback(const pcConstPtr& pc1, const pcConstPtr& pc2)
64 {
65  pc_t new_pc;
66  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud("world", *pc1, new_pc, *listener);
67  pcPtr subsampled(new pc_t(new_pc));
68  if (subsize > 0)
69  {
70  subsampled = subsample(subsampled, subsize);
71  }
72  pc_t registered;
73 
74  if (enable)
75  {
76  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<Point, Point> icp;
77  icp.setInputSource(subsampled);
78  icp.setInputTarget(pc2);
79 
80  if (!autom)
81  {
82  icp.setUseReciprocalCorrespondences(reciproc);
83  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(max_dist);
84  icp.setMaximumIterations(max_it);
85  icp.setTransformationEpsilon (eps);
86  // icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(1);
87  }
88 
89  icp.align(registered);
90  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("has converged:\t" << icp.hasConverged() << ", score:\t" << icp.getFitnessScore());
91 
92  tf::Transform transform;
93  Eigen::Matrix4f mat = icp.getFinalTransformation();
94  Eigen::Affine3d T;
95  T.matrix() = mat.cast<double>();
96  tf::transformEigenToTF(T, transform);
97  br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time::now(), "world", tf_name));
98 
99  calib::TF msg;
100  double rx, ry, rz;
101  msg.tx = transform.getOrigin().getX();
102  msg.ty = transform.getOrigin().getY();
103  msg.tz = transform.getOrigin().getZ();
104  msg.it_transl = 0;
105  tf::Matrix3x3 mat2(transform.getRotation());
106  mat2.getEulerYPR(rx, ry, rz);
107  msg.rx = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rx;
108  msg.ry = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * ry;
109  msg.rz = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rz;
110  msg.it_rot = 0;
111  pub.publish(msg);
112 
113  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*pc1, registered, transform);
114  listener->waitForTransform(registered.header.frame_id, "world", ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
115  }
116  else
117  {
118  registered = *pc1;
119  tf::Transform transform;
120  transform.setIdentity();
121  br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time::now(), "world", tf_name));
122 
123  calib::TF msg;
124  double rx, ry, rz;
125  msg.tx = transform.getOrigin().getX();
126  msg.ty = transform.getOrigin().getY();
127  msg.tz = transform.getOrigin().getZ();
128  msg.it_transl = 0;
129  tf::Matrix3x3 mat2(transform.getRotation());
130  mat2.getEulerYPR(rx, ry, rz);
131  msg.rx = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rx;
132  msg.ry = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * ry;
133  msg.rz = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rz;
134  msg.it_rot = 0;
135  pub.publish(msg);
136  }
137 
138  pub_pc.publish(registered);
139 }
140 
141 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
142 {
143  // parsing arguments
144 
145  string node_name;
146  name = argv[1];
147  node_name = "icp_" + name;
148  target_topic = argv[2];
149  tf_name = argv[3];
150 
151  // Initialize ROS
152  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
153  ros::NodeHandle nh;
154  ros::NodeHandle node_icp("/calib/" + name + "/icp");
155 
156  listener = new tf::TransformListener;
157  br = new tf::TransformBroadcaster;
158  pub = nh.advertise<calib::TF>("/calib/tf/" + tf_name, 1);
159 
160  // Synchronize both kinects messages
161  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam1(nh, "/calib/clouds/" + name, 1);
162  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam2(nh, target_topic, 1);
163  typedef sync_policies::ApproximateTime<pc_t, pc_t> KinectSync;
164  Synchronizer<KinectSync> sync(KinectSync(10), cam1, cam2);
165  sync.registerCallback(boost::bind(&pc_callback, _1, _2));
166 
167  pub_pc = nh.advertise<pc_t>("/calib/clouds/" + name + "/icp", 1);
168 
169  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::ICPConfig> server(node_icp);
170  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::ICPConfig>::CallbackType f;
171  f = boost::bind(&conf_callback, _1, _2);
172  server.setCallback(f);
173 
174  // ROS loop
175  while (ros::ok())
176  {
177 
178  // sleep
179  if (frequency > 0)
180  {
181  ros::Rate loop_rate(frequency);
182  loop_rate.sleep();
183  ros::spinOnce();
184  }
185  else
186  {
187  ros::spin();
188  }
189  }
190 
191  return 0;
192 }
